news.title: GLT 2017
news.subtitle: Starts April 22nd
news.message: We wish all the teams GOOD LUCK and will keep you posted on the schedule and other logistics in the next few days.

news.title: GLT 2017 Registration
news.subtitle: CLOSED
news.message: GLT REgistration is now CLOSED, a total of 34 teams will be participating this season.
